title: Build around yasuo
body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ux7AotP9nyg pretty much all he is good for anymore

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AAqEtfgP,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-03-07T11:19:22.876+0000)
>
> pretty much all he is good for anymore

 He is one of the most dominant AD Top/Mid laners due to his low skill cap, bs passive and ult.

If you call him shit, i dunno what's wrong with you then, lmao.
He doesn't have a low skillcap. Yeah, it's easy to hover or click on a minion and press E, but to play him effectively, you need experience and mechanix to outplay and carry.

im not calling him shit, im talking about the noobs who call him op easy because they get outplayed, try play him go "fuck this shit" then keep complaining because others smash them and they cant use him. All i see if feeder scrub after feeder scrub on yasuo. I hate it even more when you have people playing things like nasus or zed who counter him complain then he manages to outplay them.
